name: @leisurelink/optimus-prime
description: Performs transforms for the AppliesTo/Relations array to storage and from storage

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha test --report lcovonly -- --compilers js:babel-core/register -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Skylar Castille
